timeline.message: refactor: Move AlertFieldStatus and FieldErrorsSeverity to a new package
refactor: Change AlertFieldStatus to store the the FieldName rather than use a map for AlertFieldException
refactor: Update classes to remove HashMaps and use new AlertFieldStatus object
test: Update tests to use Lists of AlertFieldStatus over HashMaps
refactor: Update ValidationResult by making duplicate streams into private method
refactor: Update LabelField to use ternary operator

timeline.bodyText: Is the idea for this method to turn the Array of ValidationResult's into a Collection?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: this was created to simplify calling getErrors and getWarnings in the static of method above. We are using the ValidationResult(Collection<String> errors, Collection<String> warnings) constructor to set the errors and warnings collections.
replies.author: ChomickiM

timeline.bodyText: We should delete the commented out lines of code.
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.bodyText: Can we change the variable name mapResults to extractValidationResults.

timeline.bodyText: We should update the variable name since it is no longer a Map.

timeline.bodyText: Let's rename this to just errors because it is no longer a Map. It also helps if we change the type in the future so that it's not coupled to a specific data structure.
